headline.title: Government
headline.subtitle: The future of e-governance lies in digital identities
headline.description: GATACA’s decentralized digital identity technology improves citizen’s day to day lives by providing seamless onboarding experiences and securing online transactions.

theResult.head: The result
theResult.title: Start saving time and money, while improving citizens' day to day lives
theResult.description: SSI technology saves government resources in the credential issuance, sharing, and validation steps and stimulates economic activity by facilitating processes such as opening a bank account, renovating an ID, or even filing taxes.

theProblem.head: The problem
theProblem.title: Costly regulation compliance, lack of citizen eID adoption, and identity fraud
theProblem.subtitle: Costly regulation compliance, lack of citizen eID adoption, and identity fraud.
theProblem.description: Governments worlwide are committed to the digitization of their economy but struggle with citizen eID adoption, the gateway to these services, and high GDPR & KYC regulation compliance costs. This is mainly because current eID systems & processes are long, complex, lack the interoperability, privacy, and security citizens need, and make identity fraud ever more common.

theSolution.head: The solution
theSolution.title: Full stack, self -sovereign identity platform
theSolution.description: We equip authorities with tools to issue digitized, standardized, and secure government documents such as a national ID, passport, driver’s or business licenses in seconds. These Verifiable Credentials (or VCs) are instantly and securely sent to the citizen’s digital Wallet, where they control who can access their data. Our single sign-on authentication tool enables citizen access to any digital service, from eGovernment to healthcare, using their VCs which drasticly reduces onboarding time and offers instant access to affiliated service providers..

textBullets.text: Forget paper-based documents and complex public service processes. Digital IDs enable one-click applications, registrations, payments, access, and so much more.

useCases.title: All your citizen identification needs, covered

textBullets.text: Governments agencies issue verifiable credentials to citizens via Certify (link)
Citizens securely store credentials on a Wallet, their digital vault and masterkey to all digital services.
Citizens verify their identities by giving service providers and government agencies access to the required credentials or information stored on their wallet via Connect. (link)

bullets.title: New revenue streams
bullets.description: In addition to increase opportunities for citizens, the issuance of digital credentials represents a new revenue stream for public entities and a cost reduction in the process.

bullets.title: Privacy Protection
bullets.description: With eIDs citizens have control their personal information and enhanced privacy. From their Wallet, Citizens can control who has access to their personal information and can revoke access anytime.

bullets.title: Social Inclusion
bullets.description: Lack of identification limits the capacity of underserved communities to grow finacially and contribute to GDP. Access to eIDs provides citizens with unlimited opportunities from opening a bank account to launching a business.

textBullets.title: Governments agencies issue verifiable credentials to citizens via Certify (link)
textBullets.text: We give you the option to implement our technology on premise or Cloud, and provide sandbox environements for easier testing.

textBullets.title: Interoperability
textBullets.text: In addition to being ledger-agnostic, GATACA promotes interoperability in the SSI industry as a standards leader.

textBullets.title: Compliance
textBullets.text: Our technology includes GDPR by design, SSI eIDAS bridge, and is integrated with EBSI.

bullets.title: European Commission
bullets.description: GATACA has been twice contracted as a domain expert advisor to support the European Commission in defining ESSIF, the European Self-Sovereign Identity Framework.

bullets.title: Early Adopters Programme - Spain
bullets.description: GATACA has joined the Spanish group comprised of 5 entities which are currently implementing our technology to deploy the academic use case in the country.

bullets.title: National Pilot
bullets.description: GATACA has closed a strategic contract with a European public administration to deploy a large-scale pilot of our digital identity platform.
